channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rich New Yorkers Threaten to Leave. Then They Find Out How Hard That Is.
item.description: Tax accountants and lawyers detail the arduous process wealthy New Yorkers would have to face to avoid paying New York State and city taxes.

item.title: Man Accused of Setting Subway Rider on Fire Is Charged With Arson
item.description: The victim was sleeping on a train at Penn Station in Manhattan around 3 a.m. Monday when an 18-year-old man set him on fire, the police said.

item.title: Survivors of the Deadly Hong Kong Fire Are in Limbo
item.description: Hong Kong, with some of the world’s highest housing costs and inequality, must now figure out how to help thousands of residents who lost friends, fam...

item.title: Frank Gehry, Titan of Architecture, Is Dead at 96

item.description: Hong Kong, with some of the world’s highest housing costs and inequality, must now figure out how to help thousands of residents who lost friends, fam...

item.title: China’s Mad at Japan, and Pop Stars Are Paying for It
item.description: Beijing is curbing Japanese movies, music and art as it seeks to punish Tokyo for its support of Taiwan.

item.title: HHS changed the name of transgender health leader on her official portrait
item.description: Admiral Rachel Levine was the first transgender person to be confirmed by the Senate to serve in the federal government. Her official portrait at HHS ...

item.title: Trump official signals potential rollback of changes to census racial categories
item.description: Trump officials are reviewing changes to racial and ethnic categories that the Biden administration approved for the 2030 census and other federal gov...

item.title: Trump's 'garbage' comment met with disappointment in Somalia
item.description: In Somalia, people are pushing back and pointing to the positives after President Trump disparaged their country.

item.title: For the first time this century, child deaths under age 5 will likely rise. Why?
item.description: A dramatic drop in mortality for youngsters under age 5 has been one of the great accomplishments in global health. But estimates suggest that in 2025...

item.title: Putin and Modi expand India-Russia economic ties in talks in New Delhi
item.description: India gave Russia's leader a warm welcome in his first visit since his country invaded Ukraine. The visit in part signaled India's defiance of the U.S...

item.title: Man Who Swallowed Stolen Fabergé Egg Passes It Naturally, Police Say
item.description: The man ingested the egg locket at a jewelry store in New Zealand last week, according to the authorities.

item.title: Gianni Infantino Awards Trump a FIFA Peace Prize and Announces World Cup Draw
item.description: Gianni Infantino, head of soccer’s governing body, has been ingratiating himself with the president to help ensure a successful 2026 World Cup.
